name: Dice Breaker
description:
Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was "Roll of the Dice."

Dice Breaker is a platformer where the level is created by the roll of the dice.

Move with WASD/arrow keys (or try a controller.)

Score by hopping on dice. Keep your streak going to increase your multiplier. Stay on a die too long and it breaks.

PLEASE READ BELOW!!!

I'm seeing after I already uploaded my submission that evidently I have my main monitor set at 150% scaling for readability. Apparently this also affects the size of UI objects created in Unity. Hmm... As a result, the UI for this game will look totally screwed up at standard scaling.

Anyhow, if you set your monitor to 150% scaling in your system display settings, it should look like the screenshots above.
